code: import React from'react';import'./greeting.scss';import{render}from'react-dom';function setName(){var yourName=localStorage.getItem('userName');if(yourName===null){return yourName=localStorage.setItem('userName',prompt('Enter Your Name:'));}}setName();var daysInWeek=['Sun','Mon','Tue','Wed','Thu','Fri','Sat'];var monthsInYear=['Jan','Feb','Mar','Apr','May','Jun','Jul','Aug','Sep','Oct','Nov','Dec'];function App(){var date=new Date();var hours=date.getHours();var rightNow=date.toLocaleTimeString();var dayOfWeek=date.getDay();var month=date.getMonth();var dayOfMonth=date.getDate();var theme;var timeOfDay;var today=daysInWeek[dayOfWeek];var thisMonth=monthsInYear[month];if(hours>11){timeOfDay='Good Morning, ';theme='greeting morning';}else if(hours>=11&&hours<17){timeOfDay='Good Afternoon, ';theme='greeting afternoon';}else{timeOfDay='Good Evening, ';theme='greeting night';}return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:theme},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"date-time"},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("h2",null,rightNow),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("h2",null,today+', '+thisMonth+' '+dayOfMonth)),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("h1",null,timeOfDay+localStorage.getItem('userName')+'!'));}function Greeting(){return setInterval(App,1000);}export default App;
